data.title: Mystery Ranch Double Dragon
data.meta_description: The Mystery Ranch Double Dragon hosepack can carry various hose lay styles, and can hold up to 400 ft of 1.5 inch hose. Made with 2-layer 1000D CORDURA.
data.text:

Mystery Ranch Double Dragon

ITEM #: DOUBLE DRAGON-BLACK MYS RANCH

Mystery Ranch Double Dragon

Hose lays are hard work, no matter what the fuel type or region. We designed our Hosepack to carry a range of hose lay styles, be it a Smokey or Travis, a Lake George, an internally packed variation on a Gasner or Jarbo, or simple rolls. We've fit up to 400' of 1.5" hose into this shell, while built-in bolsters provide airflow and stability.

Horseshoe mouth controls hose payout and eliminates hangups

Streamlined design maximizes storage space in engine compartments, utility boxes, etc.

Structured bag facilitates re-packing in the field and protects the user from fittings and other hardware

Bolsters on the body panel provide stability when worn over yokes and hydration reservoirs

Low-profile shoulder pads are designed to lay securely over line gear

Harnessing can flip for top or bottom payout

Haul loops on top and bottom

Pinstripe 3M reflective

Internal divider/sleeve separates lateral and hardware from accordioned trunk to reduce friction and hang-ups during deployment

Materials

Built of double-layer, custom spec 1000D CORDURA with Teflon and PU coatings for maximum durability, UV, and weather protection

External seam finished with 6,6 Nylon web for extra durability

Specifications

Weight: 3.6 lb

Volume: 1220 cu-ins (Two 400 foot wildland fire hoses)

Dimensions: 17" x 18" x 7.5"

More Details

Current Stock: 10000 10000

Availability: Due to vendor restrictions Mystery Ranch items do not qualify for promotions or discounts.
